definitions: the action or process of selecting, organizing, and looking after the items in a collection or exhibition

examples.text: the curation of the exhibition was informed by my experience as an artist

definitions: the selection of performers or performances that will feature in an arts event or program

examples.text: I had a chance to talk with a fellow musician about the festival's curation

shortDefinitions: selection of performers that will feature in arts event

definitions: the selection, organization, and presentation of online content, merchandise, information, etc., typically using professional or expert knowledge

examples.text: curation of online content that is relevant to your business can be an excellent way to drive SEO
